error.signature: COPY failed: file not found in build context
error.regex: COPY failed.*not found in build context

verdict.summary: COPY instruction references a file that doesn't exist in the Docker build context.

dead_ends.action: Using absolute host paths in COPY
dead_ends.why_fails: Docker COPY only works within the build context; absolute paths are forbidden
docker build doesn't support volumes; only RUN, COPY, ADD work

workarounds.action: Check .dockerignore — the file may exist but be ignored during context transfer
Verify the file path is relative to the build context (the directory passed to docker build)
workarounds.how: docker build -f Dockerfile . — the '.' is the build context root
